lines.text:
[making an ice cream sundae for a little boy on the plane]
And, how would you like your nuts crushed?

[pulls out a toy gun]
How would you like your tits shot off?

[after putting Kelly under hypnosis]
Kelly Johnson...
You are the most graceful person on earth.

You have the skill of a ballerina, the, the hands of a surgeon, the, the dexterity of a... Japanese sushi chef. Now, when I snap my fingers, you will wake up feeling like the great new person you are.
Whoever wants pizza, come to Larry's room!

[talking to a blind passenger]
Fasten your seat belt! What are you, blind?

[to her poodle]
Oh, now, Poofy, don't you be a naughty girl.
I'm sorry Madam, but you'll have to put your Poofy in the box.
Awwwww. Perhaps you'd do it for me?

[the poodle growls at him]
What, are you high, lady?
This place looks a lot like the Bates Motel.
It's amazing. I knew he was going to say that.
